UnauthorizedPage.title: Access Restricted
UnauthorizedPage.description: Your account is pending approval or has been restricted.
UnauthorizedPage.explanation: We're sorry, but you don't have access to this page at the moment. This could be because:
UnauthorizedPage.pending: Your account is still pending approval
UnauthorizedPage.restricted: Your access has been temporarily restricted
UnauthorizedPage.permissions: You're trying to access a page that requires special permissions
UnauthorizedPage.contactSupport: If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team for assistance.

MatchPage.joinTeamConfirmationDescription: Are you sure you want to join this match?
MatchPage.joinTeamConfirmationWarning: You cannot leave 8 hours before the match, but if you decide to, you can request substitute and see if someone replaces you.
MatchPage.addFriendTitle: Add a Friend to the Match
MatchPage.leaveMatchDescription: Are you sure you want to leave this match? This action cannot be undone.
MatchPage.removeFriendDescription: Are you sure you want to remove your friend from this match? This action cannot be undone.
MatchPage.tooLateToLeaveDescription: You cannot leave the match less than 8 hours before it starts. However, you can request a substitute player.
MatchPage.cancelSubstituteDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel your substitute request? This means you will attend the match.
MatchPage.cancelFriendSubstituteDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel the substitute request for your friend? This means they will attend the match.
MatchPage.replacePlayerDescription: This player has requested a substitute. Would you like to take their place?
MatchPage.replacePlayerWarning: Please choose your payment method. You can pay with cash at the venue or use your balance.
MatchPage.finishMatchDescription: Are you sure you want to finish this match? This will process all unpaid fees and mark the match as finished.
MatchPage.deleteMatchDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this match? This will refund all players who paid with balance and remove all match data. This action cannot be undone.
MatchPage.blockSpotsDescription: Are you sure you want to block spots for this match? This will prevent players from joining the match.
MatchPage.selectNumberOfSpots: Select number of spots to block
MatchPage.substituteNeededTooltip: Players have requested substitutes. Please use the 'Replace Player' button on their slot instead of joining directly.
MatchPage.beforeJoinReadFAQ: Before joining the match, you must read the FAQ, click here
MatchPage.teamsNotFixed: Teams are not fixed, you can join the match with your team or with another team
MatchPage.cancelMatchDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel this match? This will refund all players who paid with balance and mark the match as canceled. Players will still be able to see the match history.

aboutUs.question: About Us
aboutUs.answer1: Our idea is born from the passion for sports, with more than 8 years of experience in Valencia, we are now renewing ourselves so that you can continue enjoying with us.
aboutUs.answer2: We are a group specialized in organizing sports events.
aboutUs.answer3: We present to you 'Crys Sports', a platform where event organization becomes much easier.
aboutUs.answer5: We have events every day and in the coming months we will expand our sports.
aboutUs.answer6: Thank you for joining us, see you soon at the next event.

howToParticipate.question: How can I participate?
howToParticipate.answer1: We have developed a system to make it very easy for you to participate in any of our events.
howToParticipate.answer2: You just need to select the day and choose the 'Event' you want to participate in, look at the details and instructions, and just click on 'join the match'.
howToParticipate.answer3: Then just show up at the field on the day and time indicated and play.
howToParticipate.answer4: Don't worry about anything, just put on your gear and play!
howToParticipate.answer5: The Match Organizer will tell you everything you need to know.

startTime.question: Start Time
startTime.answer1: Punctuality is very important to us: therefore, in all our events, 'WE WILL CALL EVERYONE 15 minutes before the start time at the field'
startTime.answer2: The time indicated in the event is the time you should already be at the facility
startTime.answer3: Time to find the organizer, know your team, and pay if necessary.

footballRules.question: Rules in Football Matches!
footballRules.answer1: In all matches, before starting, it will be decided if there will be Offside or not.
footballRules.answer2: Goalkeeper: If we don't have an assigned goalkeeper, all players will rotate every 7 minutes
footballRules.answer3: If there are Substitutes: All Players will change by turns (according to the time determined by the organizer) Generally every 7min

equipment.question: What equipment do I need?
equipment.answer2: We recommend cleats or multi-cleats for all Events on Artificial Grass or Sneakers (if possible non-slip)

weather.question: What happens in bad weather?
weather.answer1: At 'Crys Sports' we play football rain or shine!
weather.answer2: So whether it's Cold, Sunny, Raining or Snowing, We play sports.
weather.answer3: Except in extreme conditions (like alerts), we always play, matches ARE NOT SUSPENDED

cancellation.question: What if I can no longer attend an event I signed up for?
cancellation.answer1: If you have an issue, you can remove yourself as long as you're within 10 hours before the match.
cancellation.answer2: After this time, you have the option to 'request a replacement'
cancellation.answer3: Once requested, anyone can substitute you and the organization will try to find you a substitute
cancellation.answer4: But if for some reason the spot is not filled, you would lose the Money/balance/Ticket for that match or you would have to pay for the next match. Warning! If this situation repeats, you may be expelled from all our events.

facilities.question: Showers and Changing Rooms
facilities.answer1: In almost all facilities, you can use the changing rooms and their showers!
facilities.answer2: BUT! If your Event ends at 22:45 or later....
facilities.answer4: For more details, consult your Organizer before starting and they will indicate if there is a possibility of using the showers. Be responsible and take care of the facilities! If someone causes any damage or is the cause of any problem with the facility, they may be prohibited from accessing events forever.

addFriend.question: Add 1 friend?
addFriend.answer1: We're glad to know you want to bring a friend!
addFriend.answer2: You can add 1 friend and make the payment for them, and you will be responsible for their attendance.

addMultipleFriends.question: Want to add more than 1 friend or have a complete team?
addMultipleFriends.answer: To add more than 1 friend or a complete team, contact support
